root.name: Sugar Cube: Bittersweet Factory
root.description: OverviewSugar Cube: Bittersweet Factory is a puzzle platformer created by Turtle Cream. It is an extended version of the original Sugar Cube. The game was released for PC, via Steam on November 8, 2012.System RequirementsMinimumOS:Windows XPProcessor:1.66GHzMemory:1 GB RAMGraphics:DirectX compatible cardDirectXÂ®:9.0cHard Drive:180 MB HD space
